name: FW to CDL monitoring
description:
This content update provides you with monitoring of the  PANOS FW log upload to the Cortex Data Lake. Every 12 hours, a job will verify, for all the declared firewalls that traffic logs have been uploaded to the Cortex Data Lake. If it's not the case for, at least, one firewall, an incident will be created and an email will be sent. 

The list of firewalls to monitor could be directly retrieved from a Panorama integration and could be manually provided as a list of FW serial numbers.

The key pre-requisite is the configuration of the Cortex Data Lake integration.
author: Brice RENAUD
